Package org.opends.server.workflowelement.localbackend

Class LocalBackendDeleteOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.core.OperationWrapper<DeleteOperation>
      • org.opends.server.core.DeleteOperationWrapper
        • org.opends.server.workflowelement.localbackend.LocalBackendDeleteOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, DeleteOperation, Operation, PluginOperation, PostOperationDeleteOperation, PostOperationOperation, PostResponseDeleteOperation, PostResponseOperation, PostSynchronizationDeleteOperation, PostSynchronizationOperation, PreOperationDeleteOperation, PreOperationOperation, RollbackOperation
    public class LocalBackendDeleteOperation
extends DeleteOperationWrapper
implements PreOperationDeleteOperation, PostOperationDeleteOperation, PostResponseDeleteOperation, PostSynchronizationDeleteOperation, RollbackOperation
    This class defines an operation used to delete an entry in a local backend of the Directory Server.
